name: Castle: Daybreak
description:
Castle: Daybreak Is a new single player game set in a mysterious and beautiful open world. You will embark on an adventure to discover more about yourself, the world you inhabit, and the hostile enemies that inhabit it.

During your playthrough, you will have to fight wave of enemies that are ever pursuing you. Do not fear, upgrade your home base with the currencies earned from your adventures. There are a few experimental traps that will aid in your defense and various other items for you to unlock that will aid in your travels.

There are five classes for you to explore, find the one that fits your playstyle as you grow and become strong enough to see dawn!
The Classes
Rogue – Specialize in speed and agility.
Duelist – Specialized in close combat fighting.
Tank – Built to withstand even the toughest enemies.
Healer – No RPG is complete without the life of the party.
Guardian – Specialized in strong abilities to take down multiple enemies at once.
